attributes.action: Cancel all Foregin Aid to India
attributes.additional_details:
The Foregign and Commonweath Office should stop the use of UK Tax payees money being sent to India. The country has lot poor people, to look after. Yet India using it's our money to fund a space programme. Yet using UK Tax payess money to bulid new builds etc.
At $72m (£45m), the mission is comparatively cheap, but some commentators have still questioned whether a country with one of the highest rankings for childhood malnutrition in the world should be spending millions on a mission to the Red Planet.
